title: Supreme tartare sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon finely chopped capers', '2 tablespoons finely chopped gherkins', '120g (4 1/2 oz) mayonnaise', '1/2 to 1 tablespoon finely chopped flat leaf parsley', 'finely chopped shallots, to taste', 'finely chopped fresh dill, to taste', 'lemon juice, to taste']
